channel.title: Plz any1 help me set this up
channel.description:
ok so i downloaded mysql installed it downloaded dementium 637 and the client the server runs and loads the catche
[Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers.
and then after like a min this starts no idee wat to do or how to fix
[Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.TwoStacksPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.PlayerLoader.<init>(PlayerLoader.java:49) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:95) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 15 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.PlayerLoader.<init>(PlayerLoader.java:49) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:95) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.TwoStacksPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.Highscores.<init>(Highscores.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:96) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 0 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.Highscores.<init>(Highscores.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:96) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 42 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2649 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 35 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 24 Shops Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/dementhium/model/ map/ObjectManager$2 at org.dementhium.model.World.load(World.java:125) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.dementhium.model.map.ObjectMana ger$2 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 2 more
any1 help me im soo tired tryd evrything im stil new to this i just want to play around ofline as soon as i get it runing(noob not gone start with a 317 been playing around with a 508 (pretty basic stuf like fixing doors adding npc's and so on) plz tell me wats the problem and give me a way to fix it(if u can)ty for taking the time to read my noobish post)

item.title: Plz any1 help me set this up
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

Hello again, lol, your in luck because im currently using dementhium 637/639

Well, you downloaded a MySql Version of Dementhium
http://www.techterms.com/definition/mysql

Many people love using mysql for many great thing’s such as Vote Points…Automatic Donation’s
i mean the stuff is honestly Endless, i personally do not know how to work with MySql
i have the programs for it just dont know how to use them etc.
But find a Non-Mysql version of Dementhium 639 and just use that to mess around
if its just a project for yourself and maybe a few friends it would be great because it has
some great features but also needs quite a bit of work. i’m going to tell you though…
Dementhium is pretty tricky sometimes…i mean i learn new things every day from it and i code
quite a bit…i hope i helped you once again… (:

Read full topic
item.source: Plz any1 help me set this up
